content.text: Trial 2/5, Stage 'slant': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a groove oriented diagonally from the top left to the bottom right.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [175, 0, 0],
    [0, 175, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
